attributes.action: No More Turbines at Hillhead of Auquhirie
attributes.additional_details:
Turbines are being built beside residential properties, currently 7 in place the noise from the original 4 was bad enough, now they plan to put up more!! WHERE WILL IT STOP!!

Turbines should not be put up in large numbers close to residential properties.NO MORE TURBINES AT HILLHEAD OF AUQUHIRIE

Help make the government see sense!!
